recipes.name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Cook marinated chicken in a pan until tender.
Prepare the butter-based tomato gravy and mix with cooked chicken.
recipes.description: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Cut paneer and vegetables into cubes.
Marinate paneer and vegetables in spiced yogurt.
Grill or bake until golden brown.
recipes.description: A flavorful grilled dish with marinated paneer and vegetables.

recipes.name: Masala Dosa
instructions: Soak rice and lentils, grind to make batter, and ferment overnight.
Prepare potato masala filling with spices.
Cook dosa on a hot griddle and fill with potato masala.
recipes.description: A crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato mixture.

recipes.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Partially cook rice with whole spices.
Layer rice and chicken, cook on low heat until done.
recipes.description: A fragrant and spicy rice dish with layers of chicken and saffron rice.

recipes.name: Chole Bhature
instructions: Soak and boil chickpeas.
Prepare spicy chickpea curry.
Make and fry bhature until golden.
recipes.description: A popular North Indian dish with spicy chickpeas and deep-fried bread.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
instructions: Blanch spinach and blend to a puree.
Cook paneer in spinach gravy with spices.
Add cream and serve hot.
recipes.description: A creamy and nutritious spinach-based curry with paneer.

recipes.name: Idli Sambar
instructions: Prepare idli batter by fermenting rice and lentils.
Steam idlis until soft.
Cook sambar with vegetables and spices.
recipes.description: Soft rice cakes served with a spicy lentil soup.

recipes.name: Rogan Josh
instructions: Marinate lamb with spices and yogurt.
Cook onions and tomatoes with spices to make gravy.
Simmer lamb in the gravy until tender.
recipes.description: A rich and aromatic lamb curry from Kashmir.

recipes.name: Aloo Paratha
instructions: Prepare spiced potato filling.
Roll out dough, stuff with filling, and seal.
Cook on a griddle with butter until golden.
recipes.description: A stuffed Indian bread with spiced potato filling.

recipes.name: Pani Puri
instructions: Prepare puris using semolina.
Make spicy tamarind water.
Stuff puris with potatoes, chickpeas, and tamarind water.
recipes.description: A popular street food with crispy puris and spicy tangy filling.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and lemon juice.
Grill or bake until golden brown.
Serve with mint chutney.
recipes.description: A smoky and flavorful grilled chicken dish.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pulao
instructions: Cook rice with whole spices.
Saute vegetables in ghee and mix with rice.
Serve hot with raita.
recipes.description: A fragrant and colorful rice dish with vegetables.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt.
Prepare coconut-based curry with tamarind.
Cook fish in the curry until tender.
recipes.description: A tangy and flavorful fish curry with coconut and tamarind.

recipes.name: Matar Paneer
instructions: Cook tomatoes with spices to make gravy.
Add green peas and paneer to the gravy.
Simmer until peas are tender.
recipes.description: A classic vegetarian curry with paneer and green peas.

recipes.name: Dhokla
instructions: Prepare batter with gram flour and yogurt.
Steam the batter until fluffy.
Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.
recipes.description: A light and spongy steamed snack from Gujarat.
